item.description:
The Sustainable Farm School is hosting its 1st Annual Summer Love Camp for 4 Fridays (June 24, July 1, July 8, July 15) at the Shalom Company in Bloomfield, CT. Permaculture, The Art of Problem Solving, Lifefood and Poetry classes will be offered as a full day program for children ages 8 to 13. Interested? Give us a shout!

 

For more information, check out our Facebook page:

http://www.facebook.com/SFSCT

 

The Shalom Company Website

http://theshalomcompany.org/user/home.php
item.why: The Sustainable Farm School is hosting its 1st Annual Summer Love Camp for 4 Fridays (June 24, July 1, July 8, July 15) at the Shalom Company in Bloomfield, CT. 8 - 13-year-olds will study Permaculture, Poetry, Wellness, & the Art of Problem Solving.
item.name: The Sustainable Farm School: 1st Annual Summer Love Camp
